pace_maker.enabled:
✓ Pace Maker ENABLED
Credit consumption will be throttled to extend usage windows.
pace_maker.disabled:
✓ Pace Maker DISABLED
Claude will run at full speed without throttling.

weekly_limit.enabled:
✓ Weekly limit ENABLED
7-day throttling will be applied based on weekday usage pace.
weekly_limit.disabled:
✓ Weekly limit DISABLED
7-day throttling will be skipped (5-hour limit still applies).

five_hour_limit.enabled:
✓ 5-Hour limit ENABLED
5-hour throttling will be applied based on usage pace.
five_hour_limit.disabled:
✓ 5-Hour limit DISABLED
5-hour throttling will be skipped.

reminder.enabled:
✓ Subagent Reminder ENABLED
Write/Edit tool usage in main context will trigger a reminder to use subagents.
reminder.disabled:
✓ Subagent Reminder DISABLED
Write/Edit tool usage will not trigger reminders.

intent_validation.enabled:
✓ Intent Validation ENABLED
Claude must declare intent before modifying source code files.
intent_validation.disabled:
✓ Intent Validation DISABLED
Code modifications will not require intent declarations.

tempo.session_enabled:
✓ Tempo tracking ENABLED for this session
Session lifecycle tracking will prevent premature exits in this session only.
tempo.session_disabled:
✓ Tempo tracking DISABLED for this session
Session lifecycle tracking will not prevent exits in this session.
tempo.enabled:
✓ Tempo tracking ENABLED
Session lifecycle tracking will prevent premature session exits during implementations.
tempo.disabled:
✓ Tempo tracking DISABLED
Session lifecycle tracking will not prevent session exits.
tempo.unknown_subcommand:
Unknown subcommand: {subcommand}
Usage: pace-maker tempo [on|off] or pace-maker tempo session [on|off]
